nodes.text: Lynaa was a middle-aged female Twi'lek fashion designer. She regularly did charity work for wildlife groups and went everywhere with her pet voorpak, Taezii, which she carried in the pockets of her robes. She attended the launch of the luxury repulsortrain Gem of Alderaan, on Alderaan.
Lynaa was gregarious, flamboyant and eccentric and because of this, she tried to act younger than she actually was.
